Function Documentation

template<typename T>
__host__ __device__ device_ptr<T> thrust::device_pointer_cast ( const device_ptr< T > &  ptr  )  [inline]

device_pointer_cast creates a copy of a device_ptr from another device_ptr. This version is included merely for convenience.

Parameters:
ptr A device_ptr.
Returns:
A copy of ptr.

template<typename T>
__host__ __device__ device_ptr<T> thrust::device_pointer_cast ( T *  ptr  )  [inline]

device_pointer_cast creates a device_ptr from a raw pointer which is presumed to point to a location in device memory.

Parameters:
ptr A raw pointer, presumed to point to a location in device memory.
Returns:
A device_ptr wrapping ptr.

template<typename T>
__host__ __device__ T* thrust::raw_pointer_cast ( T *  ptr  )  [inline]

raw_pointer_cast creates a copy of a "raw" pointer T*. This version is included merely for convenience.

Parameters:
ptr The pointer of interest.
Returns:
ptr

template<typename T>
__host__ __device__ T* thrust::raw_pointer_cast ( const device_ptr< T > &  ptr  )  [inline]

raw_pointer_cast creates a "raw" pointer T* from a device_ptr, simply returning the pointer wrapped by the device_ptr.

Parameters:
ptr The device_ptr of interest.
Returns:
ptr.get().
